title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2203.9 - Revocation of awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2203.9 - Revocation of awards

State Regulations

Failure to comply with any of the requirements for receipt
and use of an academic performance award, including but not limited to failure
to timely file with the corporation an application for payment or a request for
a leave of absence, shall be cause for the suspension or revocation of an
award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2203.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
